name: PISTOLA (itch) (Softwool, Cauê Henrique)
description:
Kill as many enemies as you can and try to get a good position on the online leaderboard.

  • 10+ improvements to automate your character mechanics
  • 20+ different enemies that TRULY want to kill you
  • 10+ different upgrades to make your pistol stronger
  • Around 1~2 hours of gameplay content

PISTOLA is a roguelike top-down shooter where you can buy upgrades to make your pistol stronger.

made for Softwool's Patreon/Apoia.se, subscribe to help us keeping bringing games :)
